category_description: Hand-rolled incense from artisans around the world. Each stick is a journey, a ritual, a moment to breathe.
category_vibe: These aren't just scents — they're portals to different states of mind. Light one up during meditation, creative work, or when you just need to shift the energy in a space.

products.name: Galactic Sandalwood
products.description: Hand-rolled in the foothills of Nepal, these incense sticks blend pure sandalwood with Himalayan herbs and a whisper of sacred resins. The packaging is recycled paper painted with starlight motifs by local artists. Each stick burns for about 45 minutes, filling your space with grounding, meditative warmth.
products.tone_hint: Describe it like something you'd burn while meditating under a full moon or watching galaxies spin.

products.name: Desert Sage & Copal
products.description: A collaboration with a women's collective in New Mexico. Wild-harvested desert sage meets Mexican copal resin, creating a sacred smoke that's been used in ceremonies for centuries. This isn't your average incense — it's the real deal. Earthy, resinous, and deeply cleansing.
products.tone_hint: This is sacred smoke, ceremony-grade. Talk about it with reverence — it's been used in healing rituals for generations.

products.name: Lavender Dreams
products.description: Organic French lavender blended with chamomile and a hint of vanilla. Hand-rolled by a family in Provence who've been crafting incense for three generations. This one's for winding down — perfect for evening rituals, journaling, or just getting cozy.
products.tone_hint: Think: lavender fields at sunset, a warm bath, the softest blanket. This is comfort in smoke form.

products.name: Palo Santo & Frankincense
products.description: Sustainably harvested Palo Santo from Ecuador mixed with ancient frankincense resin. The Palo Santo comes from naturally fallen trees, blessed by local shamans. This is high-vibe smoke — uplifting, clarifying, and perfect for setting intentions.
products.tone_hint: This is the incense shamans and mystics reach for. Talk about it like liquid sunshine meets ancient wisdom.

products.name: Cannabis & Patchouli
products.description: Let's be real — this is the classic headshop scent, reimagined. Hemp flower and earthy patchouli rolled with rose petals and a touch of amber. No THC, just the nostalgic aroma of good times and festival memories. Made by herbalists in Oregon who know what's up.
products.tone_hint: This one brings the classic headshop energy. It's nostalgic, a little rebellious, and unapologetically earthy.
